name: UnicodeCodec
desc: A Unicode encoding form that translates between Unicode scalar values and form-specific code units.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an instance of the codec.

items.name: func decode<I>(inout I) -> UnicodeDecodingResult
items.desc: Starts or continues decoding a code unit sequence into Unicode scalar values.

items.name: static func encode(Unicode.Scalar, into: (Self.CodeUnit) -> Void)
items.desc: Encodes a Unicode scalar as a series of code units by calling the given closure on each code unit.
